clip.quote: Transactions are done 90% of the time, if not more, cash on the barrel head.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights a unique aspect of the Argentine market that may surprise international investors.
clip.suggested_hook: Did you know most real estate deals in Argentina are cash-only?
